select u.user_name, u.phonenumber, d.id, d.dept_name, cm.`name` company_name, p.post_name, IFNULL(lvyue_fee, 0) lvyue_fee,lvyue_fee, IFNULL(jingying_manager_fee, 0) jingying_manager_fee, IFNULL(yunying_manager_fee, 0) yunying_manager_fee, IFNULL(system_use_fee, 0) system_use_fee, IFNULL(system_maintenance_fee, 0) system_maintenance_fee, IFNULL(daiban_fee, 0) daiban_fee, IFNULL(guohuo_fee, 0) guohuo_fee, IFNULL(jiameng_manager_fee, 0) jiameng_manager_fee, IFNULL(yeji_buchangjin, 0) yeji_buchangjin, IFNULL(lvyue_fee, 0) + IFNULL(jingying_manager_fee, 0) + IFNULL(yunying_manager_fee, 0) + IFNULL(system_use_fee, 0) + IFNULL(system_maintenance_fee, 0) + IFNULL(daiban_fee, 0) + IFNULL(guohuo_fee, 0) + IFNULL(jiameng_manager_fee, 0) + IFNULL(yeji_buchangjin, 0) as total_fee from sys_user u left join sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id left JOIN sys_company cm ON cm.id = d.company_id left JOIN sys_user_post up ON up.user_id = u.id left JOIN sys_post p ON p.post_id = up.post_id left JOIN ( select fee.receiver_id uid, SUM(case when fee.type = '0' then fee.amount else 0 end) lvyue_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '1' then fee.amount else 0 end) jingying_manager_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '2' then fee.amount else 0 end) yunying_manager_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '3' then fee.amount else 0 end) system_use_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '4' then fee.amount else 0 end) system_maintenance_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '6' then fee.amount else 0 end) daiban_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '5' then fee.amount else 0 end) guohuo_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '7' then fee.amount else 0 end) jiameng_manager_fee, SUM(case when fee.type = '8' then fee.amount else 0 end) yeji_buchangjin FROM biz_contract_fee fee
and date_format(fee.shoukuan_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{inputDateStart},'%y%m%d') and date_format(fee.shoukuan_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{inputDateEnd},'%y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT( fee.shoukuan_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
GROUP BY fee.receiver_id ) fee ON fee.uid = u.id -- 查询条件
AND (u.dept_id = #{deptId} OR u.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.id FROM sys_dept t WHERE find_in_set(#{deptId}, ancestors) ))
and u.user_name like concat('%', #{username}, '%') ${params.dataScope}

select d.dept_name, -- 公司部门 cm.`name` company_name, -- 公司名称 u.user_name, -- 姓名 p.post_name, -- 职务 contract.num, -- 合同 contract.code, -- 合同 contract.dianmian_name, -- 区域/店面 c.`name` customerName, -- 客户名 c.phone customerPhone ,-- 客户电话 contract.fee -> '$.jingyingManagerFee.total' as jingying_manager_fee_yingshou, -- 应收经营管理费 jingying_manager_fee_yishou -- 已收经营管理费 from biz_contract contract left JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = contract.manager_id left JOIN biz_customer c ON c.id = contract.customer_id left join sys_dept d ON u.dept_id = d.id left JOIN sys_company cm ON cm.id = d.company_id left JOIN sys_user_post up ON up.user_id = u.id left JOIN sys_post p ON p.post_id = up.post_id -- contract_fee left JOIN ( select fee.shoukuan_date shoukuan_date, fee.contract_num contract_num, SUM(case when fee.type = '1' then fee.amount else 0 end) jingying_manager_fee_yishou FROM biz_contract_fee fee
and date_format(fee.shoukuan_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{inputDateStart},'%y%m%d') and date_format(fee.shoukuan_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{inputDateEnd},'%y%m%d') and DATE_FORMAT( fee.shoukuan_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m')
GROUP BY fee.contract_num ) fee ON fee.contract_num = contract.num -- 查询条件
1=1
AND (u.dept_id = #{deptId} OR u.dept_id IN ( SELECT t.id FROM sys_dept t WHERE find_in_set(#{deptId}, ancestors) ))
and u.user_name like concat('%', #{username}, '%') and DATE_FORMAT( contract.sign_date, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(), '%Y%m') and date_format(contract.sign_date,'%y%m%d') >= date_format(#{inputDateStart},'%y%m%d') and date_format(contract.sign_date,'%y%m%d') <= date_format(#{inputDateEnd},'%y%m%d') ${params.dataScope}
